Featured Article

Notice of Intent to Purchase a Custom Built Lenovo Thinksystem Server

Posted Friday, January 2, 2026

Notice of Intent to Award Contract under A National Cooperative Purchasing Agreement

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills intends to participate in the Omnia national purchasing cooperative, contract for “Advanced Technology Solutions Aggregator issued to Micro Strategies to purchase a Custom Built Lenovo Thinksystem Server.

Information regarding the contract may be found at the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills, Purchasing Department, 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany, NJ during regular business hours as well as on the Omnia website at:  https://www.omniapartners.com/suppliers/td-synnex/public-sector/contract-documents#contract-1957

It is the intent of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills to make a contract award to Micro Strategies pursuant to the proposal submitted in response to the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hill’s request.

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills is permitted to join national cooperative purchasing agreements under the authority of N.J.S.A. 52:34-6.2(b)(3).

Comment period ends:  1/16/25

Suzanne Taylor, QPA
Director of Purchasing

View Official Notice Here

Featured Article

LEGAL NOTICE TOWNSHIP OF PARSIPPANY-TROY HILLS PUBLIC NOTICE REQUIREMENT

Posted Tuesday, January 13, 2026

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN, in accordance with the requirements of P.L. 2025, c. 72, the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills provides the following public statement regarding the posting, publication, and accessibility of all municipal legal notices:

All legal notices issued by the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills – including notices of meetings, ordinances, public hearings, bids and procurement matters, and other items required by law - shall be published on the Township’s official website: www.parsippany.net, whereby the complete text of each legal notice may be obtained or viewed and will be available to the public free of charge.

Pursuant to P.L. 2025, c. 72, the validity of any Township legal notice shall not be impaired due to clerical, administrative, or technical errors; website outages; cyber incidents; or other disruptions that are beyond the Township’s control.

This notice is issued by the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills to satisfy the compliance requirements of P.L. 2025, c. 72, and shall be posted on the Township’s official website.

Khaled Madin
Township Clerk

View Notice Here

Notice of Rescheduled Council Meeting

Posted Monday, January 12, 2026
Please be advised, the Township Council of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills must reschedule its Regular Council meeting that was scheduled for January 20, 2026.  The rescheduled date is Tuesday, January 27, 2026 in the Municipal Building located at 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany. The Regular meeting will begin at 7:00 PM. Formal action may or not be taken.
 
Khaled Madin
Township Clerk

Featured Article

FEMA Presentation: ‘Learn About New Flood Maps for Morris County, NJ’

Posted Tuesday, January 6, 2026

Transparency in local government starts with keeping residents informed. Mayor Pulkit Desai is pleased to share that FEMA will be hosting two open house sessions for Morris County residents this January. With new flood maps being released, it’s vital for property owners in Parsippany-Troy Hills to understand how these changes impact their insurance and property requirements. These sessions offer a direct line to FEMA representatives for one-on-one guidance. Protecting our township's future starts with being prepared today.

Read Less Read More
Featured Article

Township Offices Closing at 1:30 pm Today

Posted Wednesday, December 31, 2025
All Township Offices will be closing early today, December 31st, at 1:30 PM.

We will remain closed through the remainder of the week and will return to normal business hours on Monday, January 5, 2026.

From our family to yours, we wish you a happy, healthy, and safe New Year! 🎉

Featured Article

Notice of Planning Board Special Meeting

Posted Monday, December 22, 2025

PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that in accordance with the Open Public Meetings Act (N.J.S.A. 10:4-6 et seq.), the Planning Board of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills will hold a Special Meeting on:

  • Date: Wednesday, December 24, 2025
  • Time: 10:30 a.m.
  • Location: Municipal Building, 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany, NJ 07054

THE PURPOSE OF THIS MEETING is for the Planning Board to conduct a Courtesy Review pursuant to N.J.S.A. 40:55D-31 regarding the subdivision of property located at 1050 Littleton Road, Parsippany, New Jersey 07054, Block 166, Lot 96, which is to be purchased by the Township.

The Board may also discuss any other business that may properly come before it. Formal action may be taken.

The public is invited to attend this meeting. This notice has been:
1. Posted on the official bulletin board in the Municipal Building;
2. Filed with the Township Clerk;
3. Transmitted to the Township's official newspapers (The Daily Record and The Star-Ledger).

Nora O. Jolie Planning Board Tech. Asst.

View Official Notice Here

Read Less Read More
Featured Article

Notice of Intent to Award Contract to Catepillar Inc. to Purchase a Catepillar Inc Model 938 Wheel Loader with Foley Inc.

Posted Tuesday, December 9, 2025

Notice of Intent to Award Contract under A National Cooperative Purchasing Agreement

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills intends to participate in the Sourcewell national purchasing cooperative, contract for “Heavy Construction Equipment” – Contract# 011723-CAT issued to Catepillar Inc. to purchase a Catepillar Inc Model 938 Wheel Loader with Foley Inc..

Information regarding the contract may be found at the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills, Purchasing Department, 1001 Parsippany Boulevard, Parsippany, NJ during regular business hours as well as on the Sourcewell website at:  https://sourcewell.website/explore-contracts/?contract_ids=2126#category_all

It is the intent of the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills to make a contract award to Foley Inc. pursuant to the proposal submitted in response to the Township of Parsippany-Troy Hill’s request.

The Township of Parsippany-Troy Hills is permitted to join national cooperative purchasing agreements under the authority of N.J.S.A. 52:34-6.2(b)(3).

Comment period ends:  December 22, 2025

Suzanne Taylor, QPA
Director of Purchasing

View Official Notice Here
